name: SpongeBob SquarePants: Lights, Camera, Pants!
description:
SpongeBob SquarePants: Lights, Camera, Pants! is a digital board game developed by WayForward Technologies, AWE Games and THQ Australia. It came out on 19-10-2005. It was published by THQ. The game is rated as "Recommended" on RAWG.
SpongeBob SquarePants: Lights, Camera, Pants! is available on PC, PlayStation 2, Game Boy Advance and Xbox.
